Name: Arcane Will - Fragment
Description: Collecting a certain number of these fragments can be exchanged for a complete Arcane Will. Arcane Will is the core material for creating "Ultimate" type Battle Imagines.
Description$english: Collecting a certain number of these fragments can be exchanged for a complete Arcane Will. Arcane Will is the core material for creating "Ultimate" type Battle Imagines.
Description2$english: Battle Imagine is the crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram combined, possessing supernatural powers.
